businessArea.title: BUSINESS AREA
businessArea.sub_title:
PopcornSAR is an AUTOSAR specialized company that supports
customers’ overall AUTOSAR project.
businessArea.content_3_2: · Develop customization Tool according to the customer request.
businessArea.content_3_3: · PopcornSAR Tool(CP/AP) can be customized with specific request.

productOverview.title: PRODUCT OVERVIEW
productOverview.menu3: AP Development Environment for SaaS Combination type
productOverview.menu1_title: System Design Tools based on Adaptive Platform Standards
productOverview.menu1_sub_title: < Support both Classic Platform’s System Design and ECU Configuration function >
productOverview.menu1_text_title2: Key features for the Adaptive Platform
productOverview.menu1_text_title3: Key features for the Classic Platform
productOverview.menu2_title: Provide Full-Set to implement Adaptive Platform
productOverview.menu2_text_content1_1: Provide Full-set to implement Adaptive Platform advanced development projects(Design tool –Generator-sample-board)
productOverview.menu2_text_content1_2: Offering practical sample and C++ Porting Guide
productOverview.menu2_text_content1_3: Provide training how to use tool and sample to practice
productOverview.menu3_title: Provides AP development environment that can manage AP’s large-scale project with SaaS
productOverview.menu3_sub_title1_1: The Adaptive Platform implementation differs greatly from the existing Classic Platform implementation. One of the biggest differences is the capacity that needed for the project.
productOverview.menu3_sub_title1_2: To process AP project, at least 2~30GB of hard disk capacity is required to make work space. Openly, it needs a total capacity of 300GB or morey for software revision history management.
productOverview.menu3_sub_title1_3: AP development environment combined with SaaS makes customers easy to manage AP project.
productOverview.menu3_text_content1: · Provides software build automation function for Adaptive Platform projects
productOverview.menu3_text_content4_2: ② Using cloud server of in-house
productOverview.menu4_title: Next Generation Network and Diagnostic Test Tool for Adaptive Platform
productOverview.menu5_title: CP Tool supports system design and ECU configuration function for Classic Platform
productOverview.menu5_text_content1_1: · AUTOSAR Software Component design, System design(ECU and Communication Networks) tools
productOverview.menu5_text_content1_2: · Easy to AUTOSAR Design by Text Modeling
productOverview.menu5_text_content1_3: · Provides 49 examples of ECUs in compliance with the AUTOSAR standard
productOverview.menu5_text_content1_4: Compatibility to ARXMLs from other AUTOSAR tools
productOverview.menu5_text_content2_1: · Supports for Configuration and Validation to AUTOSAR Basic Softwares(BSW) and Run-Time Environment (RTE)
productOverview.menu5_text_content2_2: · Provide validation and guidance for Parameters Configuration
productOverview.menu5_text_content2_3: · Supports to create new VSMD(Vendor Specific Module Definition) and provide Configuration Editor without special developments

serviceOverview.title: SERVICE OVERVIEW
serviceOverview.menu6_title: Providing practical training for the mass production project based on AUTOSAR

Understanding basic terms and specifications, types of BSW
Understanding system design and ECU configuration
How to analyze UML
How to make and verify ARXML
How to reuse SW-C
serviceOverview.menu6_text_content2_2_6:
Understanding Rte specification, Rte Event types and Rte API types
How to make Rte API with ARXML
Practice to make Atomic SWC sample
How to use Rte API to SW-C

serviceOverview.menu7_title: Engineering Service to complete AUTOSAR project
serviceOverview.menu7_sub_title1: PopcornSAR has experiences in ECU production of SW project based on AUTOSAR for European OEMs
serviceOverview.menu7_sub_title2: With these experiences, PopcornSAR can provide reliable engineering service to OEM and Tier1.
serviceOverview.menu7_text_content1_3: Network test with Panel designer of CANoe

Many specific function tool are needed to implement AUTOSAR projects.
PopcornSAR can support the needs of customers for customization tool.

LayerPopup.body:
Thank you very much for your interest in our booth
at the 10th Automotive World in Tokyo last week.
Unfortunately, after the exhibition,
it was confirmed that the email was not received to
sales@popcornsar.com until 4:00 P.M on January 25th.
Now, we have fixed the problem, and we are ready to meet you.
If you have any interest in our products and services,
please contact us by e-mail again.
Sorry for your inconvenience.
Thank you
